name: BubbleGO!
description:
BubbleGO is a nice game to have a rest - touch to launch balls at the enemy balls with the same color to increase your score and catch new balls with different behaviors.

This is simple and exciting game where you can test your reaction speed and accuracy. On the hard level you start using your peripheral vision to detect ball movement and it's color.

As bubbles have different colors, different type of movement and behavior you have to use different tactics to be successful – sometimes it’s better to destroy balls immediately, other times later. Bubbles can hide, accelerate, change size etc. So prepare your fingers and GO!



Features of BubbleGO! :

* Five different colors with five different types of behavior.
* Bonuses to slow bubble speed. Increase score and destroy any colored ball.
* Calm graphics and easy music.
* Three-difficulty levels enable play for any age.
* Local & Global High-score table.
* Separate High-score table for your personal best.
